title.narrative: STITCH Bangladesh Garment Workers Claim Their Rights - Mondiaal FNV

description.narrative: Activities related to Strengthening Workers voices in Bangladesh. STITCH aims to create a ‘new normal’ for the textile and garment industry: a production chain in which textile workers, mainly women, can exert influence on their working conditions, and where gender equality, living wages, and fair prices, decent work become the standard. For this purpose, we will engage in constructive social dialogue between industrial stakeholders, and to achieve successful collective bargaining at factory, national or sectoral level. We unite the most important players in the production chain.
